description: The image contains a mattress, a clothing item, and a box. The mattress is located at the top of the image, covering a large area. The clothing item is placed on the mattress, partially covering it. The box is positioned to the right of the clothing item, closer to the bottom of the image.

objects.name: mattress
objects.location: top of the image, covering a large area
objects.purpose: providing a surface for the clothing item and the box
objects.relationship: The mattress is the largest object in the image and is located at the top, providing a surface for the other objects.

objects.name: clothing
objects.location: on the mattress, partially covering it
objects.relationship: The clothing item is placed on top of the mattress, partially covering it.

objects.name: box
objects.location: to the right of the clothing item, closer to the bottom of the image
objects.purpose: being placed near the clothing item
objects.relationship: The box is positioned to the right of the clothing item, closer to the bottom of the image.
